products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Premium over-ear wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear audio quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

products.name: Smart Fitness Tracker
products.description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, GPS tracking, sleep analysis, and waterproof design. Track your daily activities and achieve your fitness goals.

products.name: Organic Coffee Beans - Dark Roast
products.description: Premium organic coffee beans sourced directly from sustainable farms. Rich, bold flavor with notes of chocolate and caramel. Perfect for espresso and drip coffee.

products.name: Laptop Stand - Adjustable Aluminum
products.description: Ergonomic aluminum laptop stand with multiple height and angle adjustments. Improves posture and reduces neck strain during long work sessions.

products.name: Indoor Plant - Monstera Deliciosa
products.description: Beautiful tropical houseplant known for its distinctive split leaves. Easy to care for and perfect for adding natural beauty to any indoor space.

products.name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: Double-walled vacuum insulated water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and eco-friendly design.

products.name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
products.description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with tactile switches, programmable keys, and anti-ghosting technology. Designed for gaming enthusiasts and professionals.

products.name: Aromatherapy Essential Oil Set
products.description: Complete set of 6 pure essential oils including lavender, eucalyptus, peppermint, tea tree, lemon, and orange. Perfect for relaxation and wellness.

products.name: Portable Phone Charger - 20000mAh
products.description: High-capacity portable power bank with fast charging technology. Features multiple USB ports and LED display showing remaining battery percentage.

products.name: Yoga Mat - Non-Slip Premium
products.description: High-quality yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials. Provides excellent grip and cushioning for all types of yoga practice and floor exercises.

products.name: Smart Home Security Camera
products.description: WiFi-enabled security camera with 1080p HD video, night vision, motion detection, and two-way audio. Monitor your home from anywhere using the mobile app.

products.name: Ceramic Non-Stick Cookware Set
products.description: 5-piece ceramic non-stick cookware set including frying pans and saucepans. PFOA-free, dishwasher safe, and compatible with all cooktop types.

products.name: LED Desk Lamp with USB Charging
products.description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness, color temperature control, and built-in USB charging port. Energy-efficient and eye-friendly lighting.

products.name: Bamboo Cutting Board Set
products.description: Set of 3 bamboo cutting boards in different sizes. Antimicrobial, sustainable, and gentle on knife blades. Includes convenient storage rack.

products.name: Wireless Charging Pad
products.description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Features LED indicator and non-slip surface. Includes wall adapter and cable.
